Message.Msg: You're an IDIOT where do you think I got the above information? You couldn't Google yourself out of a paper bag PS: Did you find anyone to do your DIRTY WORK? I think NOT Be a man and do it yourself you chicken little. . .

You need serious mental help buddy. you know, 99.9% of people who smoke pot are non-violent, passive, nice, hard-working decent people. Steve Jobs and Bill Gates both smoked weed. Personally, I think it should be legalized as it's far less harmful than alcohol. However, you're stuffing something more into that pipe.

btw, what information? You pulled the "649" from my screen name and ignorantly thought it was my area code, which is in fact the area code for Turks and Caicos Islands. Wow, you're really bright. Funny as people who get stoned invented Facebook, Microsoft, Apple, HP, etc...Not sure what you're smoking
